title: why have intentionally feeding as a report option if you dont enforce it?
body: i just came across a full troll for the last 16 hours of the day he has been throwing games one after another 30 deaths in one. 13 deaths in just 16 minutes... he literally was averaging a death a minute till the end....yet no punishment for this? then i look at match history and hes been doing it all day and nothing at all has happened to him? why are you not punishing people for doing this? it has ruined this game completely
